text: The training camp is finally coming to an end, isn't it?

Hey, Producer-san.
What's the schedule like after the training camp?

Well…
Is it a job where you stand in front of the fans?
Oh, haha, you see right through me.

Even though we've been far apart during this time,
many people have been thinking of me.

To all those warm fans, I want them to see the
grown-up me… the current me, as soon as possible.

I'm sure the fans will be surprised…
It's the debut of the blossomed Sakuya once again.

Hey… Do you think I've changed
from your perspective, Producer-san?

Of course… Not just in terms of skills,
but I think the current Sakuya is shining even more.

Haha, I feel like you might be praising me a bit
too much, but I'll gratefully accept it.

—Right, I wanted to let you know that we'll be
heading back soon, so I was thinking of taking a photo…

Ah, that's a good idea.
Should I take it?

Haha, thank you.
I thought you might say that.

I want you to capture me
from your perspective.

But still, it was my idea,
so I have to live up to the expectations.

Yeah.
I'm counting on you to take an exceptional shot.
